title: Question 46:
description: how can I use my sUSD?

fields.title: Answer:
fields.value: The Synthetix community is [extremely bullish](https://synthetix.community/blog/2020/04/13/the-rise-of-susd) on the potential for sUSD becoming the decentralized stablecoin of choice in the Ethereum/DeFi ecosystem. This page is for aggregating all the projects and protocols building on and integrating sUSD.

fields.title: ​
fields.value:
[Aave](https://blog.synthetix.io/susd-and-snx-are-now-available-in-aave-protocol-for-lending-and-borrowing/) for lending and borrowing
[bZX](https://blog.synthetix.io/susd-is-now-available-for-lending-and-borrowing-through-bzx/) for lending and borrowing
[Curve](https://blog.synthetix.io/susd-liquidity-trial-with-curve-iearn/) for an incentivized stablecoin trading pool
[Kyber](https://blog.kyber.network/synth-usd-susd-is-now-available-on-kyber-network-7f5e11a550ea) for trading
[Sablier](https://pay.sablier.finance/) for streaming (by-the-second continuous payments)

Another Synthetix stablecoin - sAUD - is integrated for payments with [RelayPay](https://blog.synthetix.io/use-saud-for-payments-with-relaypay/) as well.
